package.name: bitbots_dsd
package.description: The bitbots_dsd is an extended form of a behaviour state machine. It works like a stack where classes describing decisions or actions are pushed on top, executed, and popped off again. In difference to a state machine, the stack machine keeps track of the previously executed behaviour classes and re-executes them whenever the top class is popped off.
package.author: Hamburg Bit-Bots
